intro: Stellaria calycantha var. sitchana, commonly known as the Sichuan starwort, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Sichuan, China. It belongs to the Caryophyllaceae family, which includes many species of flowering plants known for their showy blooms. The plant is characterized by its delicate, star-shaped flowers that typically bloom in shades of white or pale pink. Its leaves are usually narrow and arranged alternately along the stem. This variant is notable for its adaptability to high-altitude environments and its role in local ecosystems.
